input.sentences: there seemed to be so many at the beach that day .
grandma walked me down to the shore .
lots of rules at the beach .
i fun day came to an end | with an amazing sunset .
output.sentences: A day at the beach with the family was the perfect opportunity to see them.
Grandma pointed the seagulls out while she walked along the shore with the kids.
They couldn't get too close to the seagulls on the beach, though, because there were lots of rules.
It was a fun day overall, that ended with watching the sunset.
